scripts.-- Dev ------: synchronize = true  --  Migration-files are created here
scripts.migration:create: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run typeorm migration:create -- -n
scripts.migration:generate: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run typeorm migration:generate -- -n
scripts.-- Test -----: synchronize = false  --  migration to test (this part is tested too)
scripts.test:resetDB: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run typeorm schema:drop && npm run typeorm migration:run
scripts.test:migration:run: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run typeorm migration:run
scripts.test:migration:revert: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run typeorm migration:revert
scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run test:resetDB && jest -w 1
scripts.-- Staging --: synchronize = false  --  /dist code, staging DB (scrambled prod copy)
scripts.staginglocal:resetDB: set NODE_ENV=staginglocal&& npm run typeorm:cli schema:drop && npm run typeorm:cli migration:run
scripts.staginglocal:migration:run: set NODE_ENV=staginglocal&& npm run typeorm:cli migration:run
scripts.staginglocal:migration:revert: set NODE_ENV=staginglocal&& npm run typeorm:cli migration:revert
scripts.staginglocal:src: set NODE_ENV=staginglocal&& npm run dist:clean && npm run tsc:test && npm run staginglocal:resetDB && jest
scripts.staginglocal:dist: set NODE_ENV=staginglocal&& npm run dist:clean && npm run tsc:prod && npm run staginglocal:resetDB && jest
scripts.staging:test: set NODE_ENV=staging&& npm run dist:clean && npm run tsc:prod && jest -w 1
scripts.staging:build: set NODE_ENV=staging&& npm run dist:clean && npm run tsc:prod && jest -w 1
